senses.synonym: criticise: find fault with; express criticism of; point out real or perceived flaws; 'The paper criticized the new movie'; 'Don't knock the food--it's free' <i25788>

relations.target: hate: dislike intensely; feel antipathy or aversion towards; 'I hate Mexican food'; 'She detests politicians' <i30608>
